sentence: Kinzinger and Cheney are the only two Republicans serving on the January 6 committee after McCarthy withdrew his slate of members during negotiations over the panel’s configuration and House Speaker Nancy Pelosi denied seats on the panel to ultra-conservative Reps. Jim Banks of Indiana and Jim Jordan of Ohio – both of whom objected to congressional certification of the election results from two states on January 6, 2021.
author: Gabby Orr
title: Proposal to endorse removing Cheney and Kinzinger from House GOP Conference gets more than 50 RNC co-sponsors

author: Associated Press
title: Trump’s GOP: Party further tightens tie to former president

sentence: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi last year vetoed putting Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, and Rep. Jim Banks, R-Ind., on the panel, so House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy pulled his three other GOP picks, leaving Pelosi free to tap Kinzinger and Cheney.
title: RNC censure of Kinzinger, Cheney could backfire for Illinois Republicans
